original_text: He put his hands on Joshua to show that he would be the new leader. Moses gave his authority to Joshua, as the Lord had told him to do.
korean_text: 그에게 안수하여 위탁하되 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 하였더라

sentences.original_text: He put his hands on Joshua
to show that he would be the new leader
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 새로운 지도자가 될 것을 보여주기 위해

sentences.original_text: Moses gave his authority to Joshua
as the Lord had told him to do
